testcase.name: toggles the first todo from active to completed by clicking the circle on the left of the todo
toggles the first todo from completed back to active by clicking the circle on the left of the todo
deletes the first todo by clicking the X on the right of the todo
edit the first todo and saves the changes
edits the first todo and cancels the edit
edits the first todo to "" resulting in deleting the todo
can toggle all todos to completed
can toggle all todos from completed to active
